hero.seo_description: Full Stack Developer specialized in React and Next.js. Creation of innovative, high-performance, and SEO-optimized web applications to propel your project or business.
hero.hero_description: Propel your project or business with custom-made, ultra-performant, and SEO-optimized web solutions. As a Full Stack expert specialized in React and Next.js, I transform your ideas into complete digital experiences, from front-end to back-end. Whether you're an ambitious individual or a growing business, I create web applications, CRMs, dashboards, and robust APIs that drive your growth and retain your users. Discover how my Full Stack expertise can revolutionize your online presence and optimize your internal processes.

about.subtitle: Your Web Development Partner
about.title: Full Stack Expertise for Your Digital Success
about.description: As a freelance Full Stack developer specialized in React and Next.js, I am your strategic partner for digital dominance. My holistic approach ensures robust, scalable, and SEO-optimized web applications, from back-end architecture to user interface. Together, let's transform your challenges into growth opportunities and create an online presence that captivates your audience, boosts your conversions, and retains your customers. Ready to outperform your competitors?

services.subtitle: Services
services.title: Custom Full-Stack Web Solutions
services.description: Transform your ideas into digital reality with my custom web development services. From design to deployment, I create showcase websites, SaaS applications, e-commerce platforms, CRMs, and more, while also offering redesigns and migrations.

servicesList.title: Full-Stack and Back-end Development

detailedDescription.title: Full-Stack Development
detailedDescription.description: Development of high-performance web applications using the latest technologies like React.js, Next.js, and AWS.

detailedDescription.title: Simple Monolithic Projects
detailedDescription.description: For simpler projects, I create monolithic solutions that are easy to deploy and maintain.

detailedDescription.description: Implementation and optimization of relational or NoSQL databases, with a focus on security and performance.

detailedDescription.title: Unit Testing and Documentation
detailedDescription.description: I implement rigorous unit tests and provide complete documentation for long-term project maintenance.

detailedDescription.title: Cloud Architecture and Migration

detailedDescription.title: Performance and Error Monitoring

detailedDescription.title: Proactive Maintenance

newsletter.description: Whether you have a precise idea or are seeking advice for your online presence, I'm here to help. Let's discuss your project and see how my Full Stack development services can meet your specific needs.

metadata.title: About Patrick Bartosik - Innovative Full Stack Developer
metadata.description: Discover the journey and expertise of Patrick Bartosik, a Full Stack developer passionate about React, Next.js, and Tailwind CSS. Dive into his experiences and skills to see how he transforms ideas into high-performing digital solutions. With a focus on SEO, performance, and user experience, Patrick ensures that each project is not only visually impressive but also technically superior.

aboutMe.titleMain: A Passionate Developer at Your Service
aboutMe.name: Patrick Bartosik
introduction: Welcome to my digital universe! I'm Patrick Bartosik, a Full Stack developer passionate about creating exceptional web experiences. Specialized in React and Next.js, I transform ambitious ideas into high-performing and innovative web applications.

My journey is marked by overcoming challenges and providing creative solutions to complex problems. From designing intuitive user interfaces to architecting robust back-end systems, each project is an opportunity for me to push the boundaries of web innovation.

What sets me apart? A holistic approach to web development, combining technical expertise, creativity, and a deep understanding of business needs. I don't just code; I build solutions that propel your business towards digital success.

My skills cover a wide spectrum: from front-end development with React and Next.js to creating high-performance APIs, including SEO optimization and integration of complex systems. Every line of code I write aims to create tangible value for your project.

Collaborating with me means opting for a partnership where your vision is at the heart of every technical decision. Together, we'll transform your ideas into digital realities that will captivate your users and stimulate your growth.
aboutMe.callToAction: Ready to Revolutionize Your Web Presence?

education.title: Baccalaureate in Science and Technology for Industry and Sustainable Development (STI2D)
education.location: Jules Richard General and Technological High School
education.description: French Baccalaureate with a specialization in science and technology, preparing for higher education in technological fields.

education.title: Bachelor's in Coding and Digital Innovation
education.location: IIM - School of Internet and Multimedia, Paris
education.description: Specialized degree in coding and digital innovation, acquiring practical skills and theoretical knowledge in digital technologies and software development.

education.title: Master's in Web and Mobile Engineering
education.location: IIM - School of Internet and Multimedia, Paris
education.description: Currently pursuing a Master's in Web and Mobile Engineering, focusing on advanced concepts in mobile solutions, web technologies, and application development.

professional.title: Full Stack IT Developer (Apprenticeship)
professional.description: As an IT developer, I am dedicated to creating robust web interfaces using Angular for one of the world's largest post-trade service providers. I contribute to improving critical financial systems, focusing on performance, security, and user experience.

professional.title: Full Stack Developer (Apprenticeship)
professional.description: First significant professional experience where I delved into the world of cutting-edge e-commerce. As a key member of a dynamic team, I took on the challenge of quickly mastering the Shopify ecosystem and modern web technologies. I designed and developed high-performance and innovative online stores, using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Liquid for the front-end, as well as Node.js and TypeScript for the back-end. This experience allowed me to develop solid expertise in integrating REST and GraphQL APIs, while constantly adapting to the latest e-commerce trends.

professional.title: Full Stack Developer (Internship)
professional.description: Intensive internship that consolidated and deepened the skills acquired during my academic journey. I had the opportunity to work on complex e-commerce projects, honing my skills in front-end and back-end development. This experience allowed me to gain autonomy and bring innovative solutions to technical challenges encountered, while closely collaborating with the development team.

professional.title: Front-end Developer (Academic Project)
professional.description: As part of an ambitious academic project, I led the front-end development of a showcase website for an automotive garage. Using SCSS and Twig, I created a modern and responsive user interface, integrated with a Symfony back-end. This project allowed me to put into practice my skills in UX/UI design and SEO optimization, particularly through the implementation of Google Business.

professional.title: Freelance Full Stack Developer
professional.description: Alongside my studies and corporate experiences, I run a freelance activity where I design and develop custom web solutions for various clients. This experience has allowed me to refine my skills in project management, client relations, and full stack development, while staying at the forefront of the latest web technologies.

skills.title: Expertise in Modern Technologies for Digital Transformation

skills.languagesDescription: Ability to collaborate effectively in an international environment, facilitating coordination with teams and clients worldwide.
skills.softSkillsDescription: Essential qualities for successfully carrying out digital transformation projects, ensuring effective collaboration, and stimulating innovation within your company.

metadata.title: Web Development Portfolio - Patrick Bartosik
metadata.description: Explore the portfolio of Patrick Bartosik, a Full Stack Developer specializing in React, Next.js, and Tailwind CSS. Discover a showcase of innovative web projects that combine aesthetics and functionality.

header.title: Explore All My Projects
header.description: Discover in this gallery all the projects I have worked on. From e-commerce projects to school and personal projects, you will find a wide range of web applications that I have developed or contributed to.

metadata.title: Premium Full Stack Web Development Services
metadata.description: Empower your business with exceptional online presence through custom web solutions. Expert in React, Next.js, AWS, and more for high-performance and scalable applications.

servicesPage.titleMain: Take Your Business to the Digital Era
servicesPage.introduction: As an experienced full-stack developer, I offer comprehensive and custom web services to meet the unique challenges of your business. Whether you're a startup or an established company, my solutions are designed to give you a competitive edge in today’s digital landscape.
servicesPage.imageAlt: Illustration of full-stack web development services

servicesList.title: Full-Stack Development
servicesList.generalDescription: I provide full-stack development services to create high-performance, intuitive web applications tailored to your business needs. Combining front-end expertise in React.js and Next.js with back-end technologies, I build robust, secure, and scalable systems to ensure the reliability and performance of your applications.

detailedDescription.title: Custom Web Applications
detailedDescription.description: I develop custom web applications that specifically address your business needs. By working closely with you, I ensure every feature aligns with your business goals, providing a solution that maximizes value for your organization and clients. My agile development process guarantees flexibility and rapid adaptation to changes.

detailedDescription.title: Mastery of Modern Technologies
detailedDescription.description: I utilize the latest technologies such as React.js, Next.js, and AWS to build robust, scalable solutions. This expertise enables me to create applications that grow with your business, ensuring simplified maintenance and a long product lifespan.

detailedDescription.title: Rigorous Unit Testing
detailedDescription.description: Code quality is a top priority. I implement thorough unit tests to ensure the reliability and stability of your applications, minimizing the risk of bugs and malfunctions.

detailedDescription.title: Documentation and Training
detailedDescription.description: I provide complete documentation and offer training sessions for you and your team, including user guides, installation manuals, and detailed technical references.

servicesList.title: Custom Back-end Development
servicesList.generalDescription: I design and develop robust, secure back-ends tailored to your specific needs. Whether it's a microservices architecture for optimal scalability or a monolithic project for simplicity, I offer custom solutions that meet your business's unique challenges.

detailedDescription.title: API Creation and Microservices
detailedDescription.description: I develop microservices-based architectures that allow each service to operate independently. This approach offers maximum flexibility and scalability, enabling you to deploy and update services individually.

detailedDescription.title: Simple and Efficient Monolithic Projects
detailedDescription.description: For projects requiring a simpler approach, I create integrated monolithic solutions. This architecture is ideal for mid-sized projects where centralized management and rapid deployment are priorities.

detailedDescription.title: Database Management and Security
detailedDescription.description: I implement high-performance, secure databases—whether relational (PostgreSQL, MySQL) or NoSQL (MongoDB, DynamoDB). Data management is optimized for security and integrity.

detailedDescription.title: Scalability and Automation
detailedDescription.description: Whether you choose a microservices or monolithic architecture, my solutions are designed to grow with your business. I integrate automated CI/CD pipelines and monitoring tools to ensure continuous, smooth management.

detailedDescription.title: Integration of External Services
detailedDescription.description: I integrate external services (payment systems, cloud services, third-party systems) seamlessly, ensuring full interoperability with your current infrastructure.

servicesList.title: Custom E-commerce Solutions
servicesList.generalDescription: Boost your online sales with a high-performance, secure e-commerce platform tailored to your needs. Whether you're using Shopify for a simple and fast setup or creating a custom shop with Next.js, Stripe, and Lemon for advanced referral systems, I design e-commerce platforms that maximize your conversion rate.

detailedDescription.title: Turnkey Shopify Stores
detailedDescription.description: I configure and customize Shopify stores to meet your specific needs. Shopify is ideal for businesses looking for a fast and effective solution, with intuitive management of products, orders, and payments, as well as ready-to-use features to accelerate your online presence.

detailedDescription.title: Custom Stores with Next.js and Stripe
detailedDescription.description: I develop custom e-commerce stores with Next.js, offering outstanding front-end performance and secure payment systems via Stripe. This solution is perfect for businesses needing total flexibility, custom design, and advanced features like referral programs with Lemon.

detailedDescription.title: Referral Systems with Lemon
detailedDescription.description: Through Lemon integration, I implement complete referral systems that allow your customers to enjoy discounts or exclusive offers, promoting customer retention and engagement while increasing visibility through personal recommendations.

servicesList.title: Cloud Architecture and Deployment
servicesList.generalDescription: Adopt the cloud for flexibility, scalability, and infrastructure cost reduction. Specializing in AWS and with expertise in migrating databases to cloud solutions such as Supabase, Neon, Planetscale, and DynamoDB, I design secure and high-performance cloud architectures for your applications.

detailedDescription.title: Cloud Migration
detailedDescription.description: I assist in migrating your applications and databases to the cloud, whether it's AWS or specialized solutions like Supabase, Neon, Planetscale, or DynamoDB. This migration reduces infrastructure costs and improves scalability.

detailedDescription.title: Cloud-Native Architecture Design
detailedDescription.description: I develop cloud-native applications using AWS and other cloud services to ensure optimal performance and reliability, tailored to your business's evolving needs.

detailedDescription.title: Automated Deployment
detailedDescription.description: I set up automated deployment processes using CI/CD, allowing for fast, reliable updates without service interruptions.

detailedDescription.title: Security and Compliance
detailedDescription.description: I implement robust security protocols and ensure that your cloud infrastructure complies with standards such as GDPR, guaranteeing data protection and security.

servicesList.title: UI/UX Design and Integration
servicesList.generalDescription: Create an exceptional user experience with precise design and integration. From mockup design to final integration, I guide you through each step to ensure that your application or website is not only visually appealing but also intuitive and easy to use.

detailedDescription.title: Custom Mockup Design
detailedDescription.description: I design ergonomic mockups that reflect your vision and meet user needs, maximizing engagement and customer satisfaction.

detailedDescription.title: Precise Design Integration
detailedDescription.description: I ensure faithful integration of mockups into code, guaranteeing that the final product reflects the intended design and provides a smooth user experience.

detailedDescription.title: User Experience Optimization
detailedDescription.description: I analyze and optimize user journeys to ensure intuitive navigation, increasing retention and conversions.

detailedDescription.title: Multi-Platform Adaptability
detailedDescription.description: I ensure that your application or website functions seamlessly on all devices and browsers, offering a consistent experience to all your users.

servicesList.title: Maintenance and Technical Support
servicesList.generalDescription: Ensure the longevity and performance of your applications with proactive maintenance services. I offer TMA and TME solutions, including CI/CD and Sentry integration for continuous monitoring and effective error management.

detailedDescription.title: Performance and Error Monitoring
detailedDescription.description: I monitor your applications in real-time and integrate Sentry to detect errors, allowing issues to be resolved before they affect your users and improving overall system stability.

detailedDescription.title: Regular Updates and Automated Deployment
detailedDescription.description: With CI/CD integration, I ensure fast and efficient updates, security patches, and new feature deployment with minimal service disruption.

detailedDescription.title: Reactive Technical Support
detailedDescription.description: I provide rapid assistance to resolve any technical issues, ensuring continuous service with immediate fixes through CI/CD pipelines.

detailedDescription.title: Maintenance and Error Reports
detailedDescription.description: I provide detailed reports on the status, performance, and errors detected by Sentry, helping you anticipate necessary improvements and better understand technical challenges.

servicesList.title: Custom CRM Development
servicesList.generalDescription: Optimize customer relationship management and streamline internal processes with custom CRMs. I develop complete solutions that include interactive dashboards, centralized KPIs, and seamless integration with your existing tools to maximize your company's performance.

detailedDescription.title: Needs Analysis and Customization
detailedDescription.description: I conduct a thorough analysis of your business processes to design a custom CRM that centralizes all your data and enables efficient tracking. The CRM is fully personalized to your specific needs and adapts to your workflows.

detailedDescription.title: Interactive Dashboards and Relevant KPIs
detailedDescription.description: I create interactive dashboards that provide a clear, real-time view of key performance indicators (KPIs). These dashboards allow your teams to easily track business objectives, customer performance, and other important metrics.

detailedDescription.title: Integration with Existing Systems
detailedDescription.description: The CRM is designed to integrate seamlessly with your existing systems such as ERP, marketing tools, support platforms, and other external applications, ensuring smooth data synchronization.

detailedDescription.title: Interactive Charts and Custom Reports
detailedDescription.description: I develop interactive charts that provide clear, intuitive data visualization. Additionally, I offer complete, custom reports that help you track performance and plan strategically.

detailedDescription.title: Training and Documentation
detailedDescription.description: I provide comprehensive training for your teams to ensure optimal use of the CRM, along with detailed user guides and tutorials for rapid adoption.

detailedDescription.title: Scalability and Evolution
detailedDescription.description: The CRM is designed to grow with your business, allowing for the addition of new features and modules as needed.

servicesList.title: Digital Solutions for the Real Estate Sector
servicesList.generalDescription: I offer custom digital tools for the real estate sector, including property management, real-time profitability calculation, and online rental platforms. These solutions are designed to simplify your management processes and maximize the profitability of your operations.

detailedDescription.title: Online Rental Platforms
detailedDescription.description: I develop online rental platforms (Airbnb, Booking, etc.) that simplify the management of your properties, with advanced features such as real-time booking, payment tracking, and automatic profitability calculation.

detailedDescription.title: Real Estate Management Tools
detailedDescription.description: I design custom tools for managing your real estate portfolio, including tenant management, contracts, payments, and financial reports, all centralized in an intuitive interface.

detailedDescription.title: Real-Time Profitability Calculation
detailedDescription.description: I implement systems that allow you to track the profitability of your properties in real time, with detailed analyses and future projections based on your data.

detailedDescription.title: Integration with External Services
detailedDescription.description: I integrate your real estate solutions with external services such as banking systems, property management platforms, and accounting tools to centralize and automate your management processes.

detailedDescription.title: Financial Dashboards and Reports
detailedDescription.description: I create custom dashboards to track the performance of your real estate assets. You will receive detailed reports on rental income, expenses, and key performance indicators for optimized management.

callToAction.title: Ready to Launch Your Digital Project?
callToAction.description: Each project is unique and deserves a tailored approach. Contact me today to discuss your specific needs and discover how I can turn your challenges into digital growth opportunities.

metadata.title: Contact Patrick Bartosik - Full Stack Developer
metadata.description: Contact Patrick Bartosik, an experienced Full Stack Developer specializing in React, Next.js, and Tailwind CSS. Let's discuss your projects and discover how I can help you transform your ideas into high-performing digital solutions.

contactMe.titleMain: Transform Your Ideas into Concrete Results
contactMe.description: Are you ready to dominate your online market? As a React and Next.js Full Stack expert, I'm passionate about creating digital solutions that generate measurable results. Whether you need a high-performance web application, an SEO overhaul, or conversion optimization, I'm here to transform your challenges into growth opportunities. Contact me now for a free consultation and let's discover together how to propel your business to new heights. Your digital success starts here!

benefits.title: Cutting-edge technical expertise
benefits.description: Benefit from my expertise in React, Next.js, and modern technologies to create high-performance and scalable web solutions.

benefits.title: Customized solutions
benefits.description: Get tailor-made solutions adapted to your industry and specific objectives.

benefits.title: Results-driven approach
benefits.description: Benefit from an approach that maximizes your digital ROI and generates concrete results for your business.

benefits.title: Quality commitment
benefits.description: Enjoy a firm commitment to quality, deadlines, and transparency throughout the project.

contactMe.formIntro: Fill out the form below to start your project or get a free quote. Together, let's bring your digital vision to life!

footer.readyToAccelerate: Ready to Dominate Your Online Market?
footer.exploreServices: Discover how my Full Stack expertise in React and Next.js can transform your digital presence into a growth machine. From SEO optimization to creating custom web applications, my comprehensive solutions will allow you to outperform your competitors and retain your customers. Don't wait to take the lead!

metadata.title: General Terms of Use - Patrick Bartosik
metadata.description: Read the General Terms of Use for Patrick Bartosik's website. Discover how your access and use of the site are governed and what responsibilities you have as a user.

legalText: General Terms of Use (GTU)
Article 1: Introduction

Welcome to the Patrick Bartosik website. These General Terms of Use govern your access to and use of our website and its associated services. By accessing or using our website, you agree to be bound by these terms and all terms incorporated by reference. If you do not agree to all of these terms, do not use our website.
Article 2: Legal Notice

The website patrick.bartosik.fr (hereafter "the Site") is operated by Patrick Bartosik, whose registered office is located at 28bis Rue Honoré Sohier, 93600 Aulnays-Sous-Bois, France, registered under the number 90093821800014.
Article 3: Website Access and Usage
The Site provides users with access to a variety of resources, including but not limited to:
- Informational content
- User interfaces
- Software tools

Access to the Site is free of charge to any user with internet access. All costs necessary for the access to services (internet access, computer equipment, etc.) are borne by the user. Access to specific services on the Site may require the user to create an account and provide certain personal information.

The Site strives to provide accurate information and updates. However, inaccuracies or omissions may occur. The operator in charge of the Site cannot be held responsible for any omission, inaccuracy, or deficiency in the update, whether caused by the Site or by third-party partners who provide this information.
Article 4: User Responsibilities

Users are responsible for the security of their account access credentials. Any usage of the site from a user’s account is deemed to have been used by that user. The Site reserves the right to request users to adhere to these GTU under penalty of temporary or permanent suspension of the account.

Users agree not to disrupt the operation of the service offered by www.patrickbartosik.com in any way whatsoever. In particular, users agree to refrain from posting illegal, defamatory, or pornographic messages on or through the Site.
Article 5: Intellectual Property

Content on the Site, including but not limited to text, graphics, images, logos, icons, and audio clips, is the property of the site operator or is used with permission of the respective owners and is subject to copyright and other intellectual property rights under national laws and international treaties.

Users may not use, reproduce, distribute, modify, transmit, reuse, repost, or use the content of the Site for public or commercial purposes without the express written permission of the Site operator.
Article 6: Data Protection and Privacy
For information on how user information is collected, used, and disclosed by us in connection with your use of the Site, please consult our Privacy Policy.
Article 7: Applicable Law and Jurisdiction

These GTU are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of France, without giving effect to any principles of conflicts of law. Any dispute arising from these terms or related to the use of the Site is subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of France.
Article 8: Changes to the General Terms of Use

The Site reserves the right to modify the contents of these GTU at any time without prior notice. Users are encouraged to check these terms periodically for changes. Your continued use of the site after the posting of changes constitutes your binding acceptance of such changes.
Conclusion

These GTU ensure the proper and fair functioning of the Site. By accessing the Site, you signify your agreement to these GTU. If you have any questions about these terms, please contact us at BartosikPatrickPro@gmail.com.

metadata.title: Privacy Policy - Patrick Bartosik
metadata.description: Read the Privacy Policy for Patrick Bartosik's website. Discover how your personal data is collected, used, and protected when you use our site.

legalText: Privacy Policy
Article 1: Preamble
This privacy policy applies to the site: Patrick Bartosik.
This privacy policy aims to expose to the users of the site:

- The manner in which their personal data are collected and processed. Should be considered as personal data all data that can identify a user. This includes first name and last name, age, postal address, email address, user's location or even his IP address;
- What rights users have regarding these data;
- Who is responsible for the processing of the collected and processed personal data;
- To whom these data are transmitted;
- Optionally, the site’s policy on "cookies".
This privacy policy supplements the legal notices.
Article 2: General principles regarding data collection and processing
In accordance with the provisions of Article 5 of the European Regulation 2016/679, the collection and processing of user data from the site respect the following principles:

- Legality, fairness, and transparency: data can only be collected and processed with the consent of the data owner. Whenever personal data will be collected, the user will be informed that his data is being collected, and why his data is being collected;
- Limited purposes: data collection and processing are executed to meet one or more objectives specified in these terms of use;
- Minimizing the collection and processing of data: only the data necessary for the proper execution of the objectives pursued by the site are collected;

- Reduced data retention in time: data is stored for a limited period of which the user is informed. If this information cannot be communicated, the user is informed of the criteria used to determine the duration of conservation;
- Integrity and confidentiality of the collected and processed data: the data controller commits to ensure the integrity and confidentiality of the collected data.

To be lawful, and in accordance with the requirements of Article 6 of the European Regulation 2016/679, the collection and processing of personal data may only occur if they comply with at least one of the following conditions:
- The user has expressly consented to the processing;
- Processing is necessary for the proper performance of a contract;
- The processing meets a legal obligation;
- The processing is explained by a need linked to the protection of the vital interests of the concerned individual or another person;
- The processing can be explained by a necessity linked to the performance of a mission of public interest or that relates to the exercise of public authority;
- The processing and collection of personal data are necessary for the legitimate private interests pursued by the data controller or by a third party.
Article 3: Personal data collected and processed in the framework of site navigation
A. Data collected and processed and collection mode
The personal data collected on the Patrick Bartosik site are as follows:
- IP addresses and browser cookies.
- First name, last name, email address, telephone, and company.
These data are collected when the user performs one of the following operations on the site:
- When the user visits one of the site's pages.
- When the user uses one of the contact forms.
The data controller will keep in the computer systems of the site and under reasonable security conditions all the data collected for a duration of: 26 months.
The collection and processing of the data serve the following purposes:
- Analysis of site traffic.
- To allow recontacting the user.
B. Transmission of data to third parties
The data may be transmitted to the following third party(ies):
Google and Vercel
C. Data hosting
The Patrick Bartosik site is hosted by: Vercel, whose headquarters is located at the following address:
San Francisco in the United States.

The data collected and processed by the site are transferred to the following country(ies): France, Ireland, and the United States. This transfer of personal data outside the European Union justifies the following reasons:
Location of the headquarters of third parties.
Article 4: Data Controller
A. The data controller
The data controller for personal data is: Patrick Bartosik. He can be contacted as follows:
By email: BartosikPatrickPro@gmail.com
The data controller is responsible for determining the purposes and means used in the processing of personal data.
B. Obligations of the data controller

The data controller commits to protect the collected personal data, not to transmit them to third parties without the user having been informed, and to respect the purposes for which these data were collected.
The site has an SSL certificate to ensure that the information and the transfer of data passing through the site are secured.
An SSL ("Secure Socket Layer" Certificate) aims to secure the data exchanged between the user and the site.
Moreover, the data controller commits to notify the user in case of correction or deletion of the data, unless this entails for him disproportionate formalities, costs, and steps.
In the case where the integrity, confidentiality, or security of the user's personal data is compromised, the data controller commits to inform the user by any means.
Article 5: User rights
In accordance with the regulation concerning the processing of personal data, the user has the rights listed below.
In order for the data controller to comply with his request, the user is required to communicate: his first name and last name as well as his email address.
The data controller is required to respond to the user within a maximum of 30 (thirty) days.
A. Presentation of the user's rights in data collection and processing
a. Right of access, rectification, and right to erasure
The user can take knowledge, update, modify or request the deletion of data concerning him, following the procedure set out below:
The user must send an email to the personal data processing manager, specifying the subject of his request and using the contact email address provided above.
b. Right to data portability
The user has the right to request the portability of his personal data, held by the site, to another site, by complying with the following procedure:
The user must make a request for the portability of his personal data to the data controller, by sending an email to the address provided above.
c. Right to limitation and opposition of data processing

The user has the right to request the limitation or to oppose the processing of his data by the site, without the site being able to refuse, except to demonstrate legitimate and compelling reasons, which can prevail over the interests and rights and freedoms of the user.
To request the limitation of data processing or to formulate an opposition to data processing, the user must follow the following procedure:
The user must make a request for limitation to the processing of his personal data to the data controller, by sending an email to the address provided above.
d. Right not to be the subject of a decision based exclusively on an automated process

In accordance with the provisions of Regulation 2016/679, the user has the right not to be the subject of a decision based exclusively on an automated process if the decision produces legal effects concerning him, or similarly significantly affects him.
e. Right to decide the fate of data after death
It is reminded to the user that he can organize what should be the future of his data collected and processed if he dies, in accordance with Law No. 2016-1321 of October 7, 2016.
f. Right to seize the competent control authority

In the event that the data controller decides not to respond to the user's request, and the user wishes to contest this decision, or, if he thinks that one of the rights listed above is infringed, he is entitled to seize the CNIL (National Commission on Informatics and Liberty, https://www.cnil.fr) or any competent judge.
B. Personal data of minor persons
In accordance with the provisions of Article 8 of the European Regulation 2016/679 and the Data Protection Act, only minors aged 15 years or more can consent to the processing of their personal data.
If the user is a minor under 15 years old, the agreement of a legal representative will be required so that personal data can be collected and processed.
The site publisher reserves the right to verify by any means that the user is over 15 years old, or that he will have obtained the agreement of a legal representative before browsing the site.
Article 6: Use of "Cookies" files
The site may have recourse to the techniques of "cookies".
A "cookie" is a small file (less than 4 ko), stored by the site on the user's hard drive, containing information related to the user's browsing habits.
These files allow him to process statistics and traffic information, facilitate navigation and improve the service for the user's comfort.
For the use of "cookie" files involving the storage and analysis of personal data, the user's consent is necessarily asked.

This user's consent is considered valid for a duration of 13 (thirteen) months maximum. At the end of this period, the site will again ask for the user's authorization to save "cookies" files on his hard drive.
a. User's opposition to the use of "cookies" files by the site
It is brought to the user's knowledge that he can oppose the recording of these "cookies" by configuring his navigation software.
For information, the user can find at the following addresses the steps to follow in order to configure his navigation software to oppose the recording of "cookie" files:
- Chrome: https://support.google.com/accounts/answer/61416?hl=en
- Firefox: https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/enable-and-disable-cookies-website-preferences
- Safari: http://www.apple.com/legal/privacy/en-ww/
- Internet Explorer: https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/help/17442/windows-internet-explorer-delete-manage-cookies
- Opera: http://www.opera.com/help/tutorials/security/cookies/

In the case where the user decides to disable the "cookies" files, he may continue his navigation on the site. However, any dysfunction of the site caused by this manipulation could not be considered as being due to the site publisher.
b. Description of the "cookies" files used by the site
The site publisher draws the user's attention to the fact that the following cookies are used during his navigation:
Cookies authorized and recorded by browsers.
By browsing on the site, it is brought to the user's knowledge that "cookie" files of third parties may be recorded.
It is more particularly the following third parties:
Third parties listed in Article 3.B above.

Moreover, the site incorporates social network buttons, allowing the user to share his activity on the site. "Cookie" files of these social networks are therefore likely to be stored on the user's computer when he uses these features.

The user's attention is drawn to the fact that these sites have their own privacy policies and terms and conditions of use possibly different from the site. The site publisher invites users to consult the privacy policies and the terms and conditions of use of these sites.
Article 7: Condition of modification of the privacy policy
This privacy policy can be consulted at any time at the address indicated below:
https://Patrick.Bartosik.com/policy
The site publisher reserves the right to modify it to ensure its compliance with the law in force.
Therefore, the user is invited to come regularly consult this privacy policy to stay informed of the latest changes that will be brought to it.
It is brought to the user's knowledge that the last update of this privacy policy occurred on: 21/05/2024.
Article 8: Acceptance by the user of the privacy policy

By browsing on the site, the user attests having read and understood this privacy policy and accepts its conditions, particularly concerning the collection and processing of his personal data, as well as the use of "cookie" files.

metadata.title: Legal Notices - Patrick Bartosik
metadata.description: Read the legal notices for Patrick Bartosik's website. Discover the legal information about the site publisher, host, and terms of use.

legalText: Legal Notices

In accordance with the provisions of Articles 6-III and 19 of the Law No. 2004-575 of June 21, 2004, for Confidence in the Digital Economy, known as L.C.E.N., users and visitors of Patrick Bartosik's website are hereby informed of these legal notices.

The Patrick Bartosik website is accessible at the following address: Patrick.Bartosik.fr (hereinafter "the Site"). Access and use of the Site are subject to these "Legal Notices" detailed below as well as applicable laws and/or regulations.
Connecting to, using, and accessing this Site implies full and unconditional acceptance by the user of all the provisions of these Legal Notices.
Article 1: Legal Information
Under Article 6 of Law No. 2004-575 of June 21, 2004, for confidence in the digital economy, this article specifies the identity of the various parties involved in its implementation and monitoring.
A. Site Publisher
The Patrick Bartosik site is published by:
Patrick Bartosik, having its registered office at the following address: 28bis rue Honoré Sohier, and registered under the number: 90093821800014 - Paris.
Share capital: 1000 euros
Email address: BartosikPatrickPro@gmail.com
hereinafter "the Publisher"
B. Publishing Director
The Publishing Director is:
Bartosik Patrick
hereinafter "the Publishing Director"
C. Site Host
The Patrick Bartosik site is hosted by:
Vercel Inc., located at the following address: San Francisco in the United States.
hereinafter "the Host"
D. Users
All Internet users who browse, read, view, and use the Patrick Bartosik site are considered users.
hereinafter "the Users"
Article 2 - Accessibility
The Site is in principle accessible to Users 24/24h and 7/7d, except for interruption, scheduled or not, for maintenance needs or in case of force majeure.

Should access to the Site become impossible, efforts will be made to restore access as soon as possible. The Site cannot be held responsible for any damage of any nature resulting from its unavailability.
Article 3 - Applicable Law and Jurisdiction

These Legal Notices are governed by French law. In case of dispute and in the absence of an amicable agreement, the dispute will be brought before the French courts in accordance with the rules of jurisdiction in force.
Article 4 - Contact

For any reporting of illegal content or activities, the User may contact the publisher at the following address: BartosikPatrickPro@gmail.com, or by registered mail with acknowledgment of receipt sent to the publisher at the coordinates specified in these legal notices.
